title: Public Records Request – Dashcam and Bodycam Footage – July 19, 2023 Arrest of Dylan Lemma

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

I respectfully request access to the following public records related to the July 19, 2023 incident and arrest of Dylan Lemma, the 19-year-old son of Sheriff Dennis Lemma:

Dash camera footage from the deputy who attempted the traffic stop around 8:00 a.m. near East Lake Drive and Celestial Way, involving a Ford Mustang and a white Nissan, both allegedly racing.

Any available body-worn camera footage from deputies involved in the attempted stop, identification, or follow-up investigation.

According to public reports and agency statements, Dylan Lemma fled at high speed in a Ford Mustang after a Seminole County deputy attempted a traffic stop, and later turned himself in to the John E. Polk Correctional Facility on charges of fleeing and reckless driving. The incident has drawn public interest due to the relationship between the suspect and the head of the agency.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News

title: FOIA Request – Bodycam and Related Records – Jan. 15, 2025 Arrest of David Allsop (Flight 3772, DUI)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Georgia Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting access to public records related to the January 15, 2025 arrest of Southwest Airlines pilot David Allsop, age 52, at Savannah/Hilton Head International Airport, including:

All body-worn camera footage from officers involved in the investigation, detainment, and arrest of Mr. Allsop on DUI charges at the airport, beginning from initial contact near or before 7:00 a.m.

Surveillance or security footage from the airport (if available and not exempt), particularly any camera angles showing the pilot’s interaction with security, gate agents, or passengers.

Mr. Allsop was reportedly preparing to operate Southwest Flight 3772 to Chicago and was arrested before takeoff for allegedly showing visible signs of intoxication. The incident resulted in significant flight delays and raised public interest about aviation safety and pilot screening.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News

title: FOIA Request – Bodycam and Dashcam Footage – Nov. 10, 2024 Arrest of Samantha Steele

communications.subject: Illinois Freedom of Information Act. Request: FOIA Request – Bodycam and Dashcam Footage – Nov. 10, 2024 Arrest of Samantha Steele
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

I request the following records related to the arrest of Samantha Steele on the evening of November 10, 2024, in the 5000 block of North Ashland Avenue, Chicago, IL:

All body-worn camera footage from all Chicago Police Department officers involved in the DUI stop, investigation, and arrest of Ms. Steele, including her transport and on-scene interaction with officers.

All dash camera footage from squad vehicles present at the scene from the time of arrival through Ms. Steele’s departure.

Rear seat footage depicting the suspect's transportation from the scene.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News
